short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper extension for PlatoSync internal Users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to quickly manage data synchronisation between plato accounts. A highly productive tool for PlatoSync users. 

What can you do with Plato Synchroniser Extension?
1.) Login to your PlatoSync account using Google SignIn or provided credentials.
2.) Link with your provided role or create one.
3.) Start syncing your data between Plato and PlatoSync accounts.
4.) Authenticate users with OTP to retrieve data for synchronisation process.
5.) Check your data sync process.

Useful only for PlatoSync account holders.
